title: Danielle Lloyd goes back to her glamour modelling roots following latest cosmetic surgery
text:

Danielle Lloyd has decided to make a return to glamour modelling after admitting cosmetic surgery made her feel "womanly again".

Following her breast augmentation, liposuction and Brazilian bum lift in September, the TV star has started to take things seriously and has set up an OnlyFans account.

The mother-of-four has husband Michael O'Neill's full support to display her incredible physique in exclusive x-rated snaps to her fans.

She told Closer that she feels happier and more confident than ever.

Danielle decided it was time to fix her "wonky boobs" after she underwent a botched job in 2016.

She jetted out to a celeb favourite Turkey clinic used by Katie Price to go under the knife, and decided to have the liposuction and bum injections too.

(Image: WireImage)

Danielle added: "My surgeon said he needed to take fat from my stomach to reconstruct my left breast, but then he suggested putting some of the excess fat into my bum and hips to give me a nice shape. I said, 'Go on then, get it in there! Why not?'"

The reality TV star has previously spoken about struggling with her breasts, after reconstruction to fix her implants.

(Image: Instagram)

She confessed that the replacement implants had a serious effect on her health, and it left her feeling "sick and drained".

After the surgery Danielle gushed that she's never felt more confident, saying: "When I came round and saw my boobs, I literally cried my eyes out. I couldn't stop hugging them. They're still healing, but I'm so happy.

(Image: Instagram)

"I was desperate to feel womanly again. Now I can't wait to go on holiday - I'll wear the most ''itsy bitsy'' bikini I can find!"

Michael has no problem with the star posting racy snaps on OnlyFans, and the pair are still planning to try for a fifth child in their mission for a baby girl - despite her brand new bod.
description: She's taken the next step and created an OnlyFans account to kickstart her return to the glamour modelling scene
